tool_description: Get the current time for any location in the world. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/worl

function.name: v1_worldtime
function.description:
API Ninjas World Time API endpoint. Returns the current date and time by city/state/country, location coordinates (latitude/longitude), or timezone.
One of the following parameter combinations must be set:
lat + lon,
city (state and country optional),
timezone

state.description: US state name or 2-letter abbreviation (for United States cities only).
